MAN.TITLE: ihough

PARAM_ITEM.PARAM_DESCRIPTION: binarized Hough transform accumulation matrix. Rho varies along rows; theta varies along columns. Theta range is 0-179 degrees w/ 180 samples.
vector with the size of the output image. Can be the output of the size routine.
binary image with digital straight lines

DESCRIPTION.P: Function ihough calculates the inverse hough transform of a binary image. It takes as input a binarized hough image, and draws the corresponding digital straight lines in the output image.

AUTHORS.AUTHORS_ITEM: Ricardo Fabbri <ricardofabbri (AT) users DOT sf DOT net>

"Shape Analysis and Classification", L. da F. Costa and R. M. Cesar Jr., CRC Press.
